title: Ticket #6802: Document late materialization for the 8.8 series
description:
As of 8.8, late materialization is enabled in the schedd by default, so it should be documented and the limitations should be described. We expect to address these limitations in the 8.9 series - in particular adding support for remote submit and spooling of input files.

---ticket moved to jira and fixed there---
creator: johnkn
